stunner.name: A Nostalgic Summer
stunner.content: Letâ€™s take a trip down memory lane when in summer vacations, we visited our grandparents. The endless mango eating sessions, late night cold coffee sessions with cousins, the Khus infused air coolers, and breezy cotton clothes. For this challenge, take inspiration from your summer memories and create a video showing us your three all-time favourite summer outfits!  Upload it on the Hipi app before the 14th of August and get one step closer to becoming a Hipi Stunner.

stunner.name: For the Moody Monsoon
